English: Did you need me, Sir Ricardo?
You seem to leave your spot pretty often these days.
The recent battle with demons had a lot of civilian casualties, along with the holy warriors.
I was delayed while attending to those who were in need. I apologize.
Hahaha! There's no need to apologize!
I already know that you can't ignore anyone in need of help.
By the way, Lucias, I found out it's your birthday today!
I would have prepared a celebration earlier,
but I tend to forget about these events as I grow older, hahaha!
I'm sorry I'm kind of late.
It's not much, but here's a little something for you.
Thank you.
...But how did you know that today is my birthday?
A letter from the Magician of Stardust arrived for me today.
He must be a friend of yours if he remembered your birthday. What an interesting friend you have.
Ha ha... yeah... I suppose so.
By the way, do you ever visit your hometown?
No, I've never had the chance.
All parents tend to long for their children once they leave on their own.
They always worry about the health and the safety of their children.
That in turn makes them stay awake at night.
And today happens to be an important day for you.
Why don't you take a breather and visit your hometown?
Lucias, take these to your parents.
Thank you for always sharing the crops.
Ha ha ha, there's no need to thank me. You're the one who's keeping this village safe.
I'm always grateful to the Goddess.
After all, she has sent us a blessed child like you to our side...
I'm embarrassed to hear that from everyone...
Outside of this village, the world is filled with sadness and pain.
We have suffered through similar hardship until you were born.
You are the reason why we are able to smile today.
I am also relieved... to know that everyone is happy...
(If I can use what little strength I have to help those in this village...)
(Will I be able to save those outside of this village as well?)
(To create a world... where everyone can be happy... without pain or suffering...)
There are people in the world that I could not save.
Even now, I can still hear the voices through the chaos and horror coming from the palace.
I don't think I can return home just yet.
(Not until I can complete my mission...)
(I must save those in pain... and grant them peace.)
I'm sorry for turning down your kind offer.
Hahaha, don't be!
If that's what you wish, I can't force you to leave.
There wasn't much written in this letter...
I just made the suggestion since I felt that this person wanted you to get some rest.
That might be a bit hard to do right now, ha ha.
Wahaha, that's enough nagging from me today. You should really take it easy for today.
...I will try my best. May the blessings of the Goddess be with you.
Whew...
Huh? This is...?
I knew you were going to act like that. Have a great birthday.
Hahaha, you're still the same...
Wow! That's a huge cake! Awesome! Happy birthday!
Happy birthday! Here's your present! I really like this, but I'll give it to you for your birthday!
Thanks! Let's dig in now! Look! My mom baked my favorite!
Hold on! You can't eat the cake yet! What about the song? And the fireworks!?
Then, let's sing quickly and eat the cake!
Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you!
Birthday...?
Hm? Welcome, Lavril.
What is it?
Hello... Uh, I just have a question.
U-uh, so... what's this festival going on in this village now?
A festival?
Yes, there are a lot of people talking about... birthdays.
E-everyone looked really happy...
There's a giant cake, presents... and people singing together...
B-but if you don't know, Ophelia... Is it not a festival?
Ah, are you talking about a birthday party?
Birthday, party...?
Yeah! On someone's birthday, family and friends gather to celebrate.
You receive presents from everyone and make a wish upon a candlelit cake...
Ah! And you get to eat a bunch of your favorite food.
I see... Do you have a birthday too, Ophelia?
Heh, my birthday is in the summer. It's not too far off.
We... don't have birthdays. Since we are... us....
We want... to have a party too...
It looks really fun... celebrating with friends...
Mm... Well, a birthday doesn't always have to be on the day of your birth.
R-really?
Those who don't know their birthdays use a different holiday...
or choose a special day as their birthday to celebrate.
So, why don't we make today your birthday, Lavril?
Today...?
Yeah. Since today is the day you learned about birthdays! What do you think?
O-okay...!
Then, let's have a party! Do you have any friends you want to invite?
Friends... Ophelia, Rephy, Shea... and... Can we invite Lucias as well...?
I'm sure he'll come to celebrate.
I know that he's really busy, but he should be able to stop by.
...Heh heh, that's good...
Okay, then let's write the invitations together!
...Right!
Hi, Kara! Good morning!
Did you sleep well, Master?
What happened just now is equivalent to the sun rising from the west.
It's the first time you woke up without my alarm, Master.
Hahaha! But today is Kara's birthday! I have to get up early on this important day!
What do you think? Were you surprised? Were you?
When I checked your pulse last night, you were asleep from sunset.
Although it wasn't very probable, I could predict it.
...Hm, I guess that was too weak.
Wait! You always check my pulse?
It's for your safety, Master.
...Geez, I really don't have any privacy... ha ha.
*Grumble* I may have failed this time, but I'll succeed next time for sure!
Let's go, Kara! We need to go somewhere.
Master, it's time for work.
There's no need to work on a day like this! I have a lot of vacation time left! Let's go!
Yes, Master.
It's time. They're... coming!
Initiating combat preparation.
Meooooow!
Nya? Meow!
Meow! Purr... Purrrrr...
No. 1, 2, 3! Charge at Kara!
Ta-da! What do you think of my Cat Legion!?
Didn't you feel your heart race? Er, I mean, engine? Were you surprised?
I have already recognized an irregularity in your activity patterns despite your lack of exercise.
I found you were taking care of the cats as I had followed you five months ago.
Kinship Rate between No.1, 2, 3, and me is already maxed out.
…Kara, you were following me..? That's creepy.
Heh! But I'm going to make sure the last event succeeds for sure!
Now! It's time for the finale for your birthday!
Yes, Master.
Where are we, Master? These coordinates are not included in my map data.
Ahahaha! I have been keeping this place a secret for today!
Just wait a bit and... Wow! There it is! Kara, look!
I did not expect this. The moon looks incredibly large today.
But the moon did not grow bigger, it is just an illusion...
Come on, Kara. This is a rare sight of this beautiful moon.
Yes, Master.
How do you feel?
Engine RPM rising. Neural circuits are circulating fast.
It is as I am feeling a slight tingle of current that runs from my head to toe.
Is this what you call being surprised?
It doesn't seem like you were surprised that much, but you managed to learn a new emotion. Heh.
Here! This is my last present for you! Happy birthday, Kara!
Thank you, Master.
But where did you get the money for those fireworks?
Huh? Obviously, it's coming out of this month's salary...
Understood, Master. I will reduce your personal expenditure budget this month by the cost of the fireworks.
Wah! You're so cruel, Kara!
Fire the salute!
Happy birthday, Great Pirate Miruru!
Captain, happy birthday!
Yeah, thanks! Then, let's get on with it!
Ha? What you saying?
Isn't it obvious? When it comes to birthdays, you're suppose to prepare that!
That's right, stupid! This is what you get for birthdays! Here you are, Captain!
This isn't it!
Huh? I thought a cake would be appropriate for a birthday.
Kyahaha! You idiot!
Ah, a cake is nice.
But when it comes to birthdays, you're suppose to get presents!
Right!
Then, bring them out now.
Here!
...What's this?
It's not a treasure?
Special gunpower from your friend Lakrak, Captain!
Message too!
Birthday? I busy with research! Happy birthday anyway!
And I give this for special too!
Hm... hm! Since it's a special gunpowder, I'll accept it, even if it's not a treasure!
Since I'm an honorable pirate who respects my friends!
Alright, then why don't I fire one off
to celebrate my birthday as the Great Pirate Miruru?
Hmm…
What?
I forgot something.
Something important…
Ah.
Lakrak told…
That gunpower not tested.
Careful and,
report result.
Should we run away first?
Good.
Hm...
I guess the wick is long enough.
It was bit of a nuisance getting the recipe, but it all worked out.
Now all I need is wait for him to come...
You called me night?
I awake three day researching weapon!
I really sleepy! How important it?!
Ha, here we go again...
Hey, Lakrak. Have you forgotten what day it is?
Today? I don't know. I don’t sleep three day.
And who you? Answer first!
You're still good at taking the wind out of my sails.
Look here, shouldn't you remember my face by now?
That weapon you're carrying around. You should've...
Did you forget who helped you finish that?
When I look back at those times when you ordered me around to get that stupid special gunpowder...
Special gunpower… Yes Remember! You Roi!
And I called him my friend...
Did you really forget what today is for you?
You should at least remember your own birthday.
Ack? Today my birthday?
No important!
Make strong weapon is more important!
You don't even surprise me anymore.
Anyway, I prepared something special for you.
Oh, that has a nice boom!
No wonder Cleo always uses stuff of the greatest quality.
Wh-what is it?
They're fireworks, as you can see. I prepared some big ones for your birthday.
What do you think? Aren't they pretty good?
Th-this… This…!
Ha ha, are you tearing up already? Wait until you see my present...
What you doing?
How dare use golden gunpower like this!?
You super idiot!
Wh-what?
Gunpower is only thing noble!
No way! You no my brother anymore!
Are you... serious?
Useless? Do you know what I've gone through to prepare this?
No matter! You waste gunpower!
I never forgive you! Gunpower precious!
O-ho... Is that so?
I actually prepared an incredible present for your birthday...
I believe it was called…
A newly invented Super Ultra Special Gunpowder or something?
It's considered the best within the Empire. It was tough, getting it through the black market...
Well, I guess it's no use since you don't need it.
Well then... How should I get rid of this stuff?
It should be pretty expensive if I sell them. I guess I won't have to worry about money for a while.
Or maybe I could pack them up again and give them to Cleo for her birthday.
Ha ha, I can just see the smile spreading across her face.
Hang on! We need talk!
Hm? Do you have any business with a blasphemer like me?
E-eeek...!
Move aside if you don't have anything to say. I have to figure out how to deal with these...
I-I'm sorry! I talk harsh!
I want your present! That Super Ultra Special Gunpower! I want!
*Sigh...* Dealing with you is so exhausting.
Wah! Waaah! Waaaaaah!
Hey, Lakrak. I know you're happy, but give it a rest.
What you talk? This gunpower saint!
I want research it! My weapon will strong and best!
*Sigh...* You punk.
Anyway, I'm leaving now. Don't push yourself too hard.
Okay! Take care!
Wahaha! Roi care me! Roi the best!
Ack… But I can't remember Roi face. No!
I can't remember.
I don't know. I go see my present.
Hah hah.
...What in the world is an Imperial Guard doing in a place like this...?
I'm here to meet you, of course.
I thought you were a busy man, Sir Fluss?
You shouldn't waste time on a commoner knight like myself...
Ha ha, but that commoner knight seems to be very noble and talented.
I just couldn't ignore such a person.
And the fact that she won the tournament three times in a row is intriguing as well.
You were my last opponent.
If we fought until the end, I would have lost for sure.
In that case, the three consecutive wins...
Hah hah, I don't know what you're talking about.
Are you talking about that man with twin swords who fought with you so valiantly?
I really wanted to fight against him myself, but I could never figure out where he came from.
Besides, I'm here to introduce you to a new friend today.
Nice to meet you, I am the Commander of the Velchia Magic Knights, Chrisha.
I am currently acting as the Emperor's inquisitor.
Ah, Commander Chrisha!?
What brings you here...?
(Hm, I was wondering who Sir Fluss was so interested in...
I suppose if it's her, the famous Shield of Empire...)
Ah, excuse me.
The purpose of my visit today is simple.
Happy birthday, Glenwys.
This is a present that Sir Fluss and I prepared. Please accept it.
...Ah! Th-thank you.
But how did you know that it's my birthday...?
Of course, through the regular letters... ahem! Never mind.
I heard from the Commander of the Capital Guard Knights that
you spent your birthday alone last year too.
Ah...
...Thank you for your kindness.
But it's a bit... too much.
There is no reason for you to show me this much care...
Ha ha, let's just say we're investing in the future of a great talent.
If it's that much of a burden, why don't you treat us lunch then?
I'm starting to feel a bit hungry.
Hm, that's a good idea.
But since there are dishes I don't know about, I'll trust you to choose what we eat.
...Hahahaha.
Hm?
N-no, I'm just happy to know that you think well of me.
It may be cheap commoner food... but I hope you like them.
Great Sage of the Forest, we congratulate the birth of the great one!
Many blessings and peace upon the Elf Druid Lorraine!
I'm just very honored to receive such a warm welcome every year.
It's really nothing. Lorraine, you are a proud Great Sage of the Elves.
If it wasn't for you, we can't even imagine what would have happened to Elidora Forest.
Hah hah, don't flatter me like that. I'm embarrassed.
Oh, am I too late?
Oh my, you are…!
Hahaha, I apologize.
I can't believe I'm late for the birthday of the Great Sage Druid.
No need to apologize. I'm just grateful to have you here, Chieftain of the Orcs.
I ended up making the Harpy Warrior get lost along the way as well... I'm sorry, Naila.
I joined you in this journey because we were heading the same way. You don't need to be sorry.
Great Sage of the Elves, as the representative of the Harpies, I, Naila, wish you a great birthday.
Thank you, Naila.
Good lord... Today's birthday party is going to be a lot more crowded than usual.
Ahhhhhh!
Ow!
What? Oddy...! What are you doing here?
Oh, my head is spinning... Ah, Lorraine?
Oof, looks like I made it!
I mean, Nyx promised me I was going to make it in time!
But he gave me the wrong stuff, so I had to come all the way from the Lamp-keeper Town!
Although I managed to pick up the Tamian Tribe present along the way... No, wait, that's not important!
Ahem, hm! Happy birthday, Lorraine!
Here! This is my present along with the Tamian Tribe's!
I almost took him out, thinking that he was an intruder... I did not expect him to be a friend of the Sage.
Hahaha, you don't let your guard down, even on a day like this. That's a warrior of the Harpies for you.
Anyway, are all of our guests here, then?
Mm... I guess?
It's a bit awkward to have the forest so crowded like this...
Today is a fitting occasion for this, though. Hahaha.
Alright, Lorraine. It's time for the main event.
Happy birthday, Great Sage!
Everyone...
Thank you so much. I will keep everyone's wishes with me for all eternity.
(I hope this peace lasts forever and ever...)
